name: places/ChIJb85ryKFZwokRApsII6pcj8E
formattedAddress: 134 E 17th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 134 E 17th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: I like supporting small businesses but this dry cleaner is incrediblely inconsistent and will deliver you clothes with stains still on it without even notifying you. Only when you call them will they tell you that the stains couldn’t be removed but they’ll try again.l (and then when they do, it miraculously comes out). I had a few additional clothes dry cleaned that I just opened and they’re all stained. I would suggest trying another place as this location is expensive and customer service just isn’t there.

text.text: I like supporting small businesses but this dry cleaner is incrediblely inconsistent and will deliver you clothes with stains still on it without even notifying you. originalText.text: Amazing place for wash and fold + alterations! Everyone is very nice and helpful.

text.text: Amazing place for wash and fold + alterations! Everyone is very nice and helpful.

originalText.text: STAY AWAY if you value your clothes.  I went in yesterday to get two shirts cleaned.  They were accommodating to allow me to give my shirts at 10am and still get them back same day.  Worst decision I made.  Shirts went in clear and were returned with Stains.  There were marks on the front and back.  The collar was not cleaned properly.  Instead of admitting the mistake she started to out the blame on me that it was my fault.  The cost for cleaning was minor so money was not the issue but an issue of principle.  She refused to offer me a refund which is less than $10.  They dont care about your clothes.  If its clean good, not clean don't care we got your money already.   Highly recommend to stay away from this place.

originalText.text: The tailor at Irving Cleaners is so experienced and does an excellent job. She fixed my dress exactly way I wanted them and did a fabulous job.

text.text: The tailor at Irving Cleaners is so experienced and does an excellent job. She fixed my dress exactly way I wanted them and did a fabulous job.

originalText.text: I brought in white dress pants and a white shirt for a client. Coffee stains and an exploded pen, I basically thought they were done. These guys handed me back bright white clothes without a hint of staining, I was stunned. Very happy with their service. Very friendly, quick service.
